requirement_summary: Designation as gatekeeper and notification obligations
description: Documentation assessing whether the undertaking meets the quantitative thresholds for gatekeeper designation including annual turnover, market capitalisation, active user counts, and core platform service identification
auditor_questions: Show me your assessment of whether your services meet the gatekeeper thresholds
How do you calculate and verify active end user and business user numbers?
What core platform services have you identified for notification?
How do you monitor changes that could affect your gatekeeper status?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic threshold assessment performed, notification submitted
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic monitoring of threshold metrics, regular reassessment cycle
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated threshold tracking, proactive compliance monitoring, predictive analytics for user growth

description: Documented procedures for complying with Article 5 obligations including refraining from combining personal data across services without consent, allowing business users to offer different terms on other channels, and enabling side-loading of applications
auditor_questions: How do you ensure personal data from different core platform services is not combined without user consent?
Show me evidence that business users can promote offers outside your platform
How do you enable users to install third-party applications?
What technical measures prevent circumvention of these obligations?

maturity_levels.basic: Core obligations identified and basic compliance measures implemented
maturity_levels.intermediate: Systematic compliance framework, monitoring tools, regular testing
maturity_levels.advanced: Automated compliance enforcement, proactive design for interoperability, continuous monitoring dashboards

description: Documentation of measures taken to comply with obligations susceptible to further specification, including data portability, interoperability, access to ranking and performance data, and prohibition of self-preferencing
auditor_questions: How do you ensure real-time data portability for end users and business users?
What interoperability measures have you implemented for ancillary services?
Show me how you provide business users with access to ranking and performance data
How do you prevent self-preferencing in search results and rankings?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic compliance measures for each obligation identified
maturity_levels.intermediate: Technical implementation documented, effectiveness metrics tracked
maturity_levels.advanced: Full interoperability framework, real-time portability tools, independent fairness audits of rankings

description: Technical documentation of messaging interoperability implementation including protocol specifications, API documentation, end-to-end encryption maintenance, and timeline for enabling group messaging features
auditor_questions: Show me your technical implementation plan for messaging interoperability
How do you maintain end-to-end encryption while enabling interoperability?
What APIs and protocols have you published for third-party messaging providers?
What is your timeline for enabling group messaging interoperability?

maturity_levels.basic: Interoperability plan published, basic text messaging interoperability
maturity_levels.intermediate: Rich media support, documented APIs, end-to-end encryption preserved
maturity_levels.advanced: Full feature parity for interoperable messaging, real-time protocol updates, developer ecosystem support

description: Comprehensive compliance report submitted to the European Commission detailing measures taken to comply with Articles 5, 6, and 7, including technical specifications, effectiveness assessments, and non-confidential summaries
auditor_questions: Show me the compliance report submitted to the European Commission
How do you demonstrate that compliance measures are effective?
What is your process for engaging in regulatory dialogue with the Commission?
How do you handle Commission requests for additional information or modifications?

maturity_levels.intermediate: Detailed effectiveness analysis, proactive stakeholder engagement
maturity_levels.advanced: Continuous compliance monitoring with real-time reporting, pre-emptive compliance adjustments

description: Log of all reports and notifications submitted to the European Commission including consumer profiling techniques, user statistics, acquisitions, and any changes that affect compliance obligations
auditor_questions: Show me the log of reports submitted to the Commission over the past year
How do you track and report acquisitions to the Commission?
What consumer profiling techniques do you report and how are they documented?
How do you ensure timely and complete reporting of material changes?

maturity_levels.basic: Reports submitted as required, basic record keeping
maturity_levels.intermediate: Automated reporting calendar, structured data collection, compliance tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Real-time reporting capability, automated data aggregation, predictive compliance monitoring

description: Independent audit report covering compliance with DMA obligations, including audit of consumer profiling practices, description of profiling techniques used, and submission of audit results to the Commission and national authorities
auditor_questions: Show me the most recent independent audit report on DMA compliance
How was the auditing organisation selected and is it independent?
What findings were identified regarding consumer profiling practices?
How have you addressed audit recommendations and findings?

maturity_levels.basic: Annual audit completed and submitted to the Commission
maturity_levels.intermediate: Detailed audit scope covering all obligations, remediation plan with tracking
maturity_levels.advanced: Continuous assurance programme, real-time compliance dashboards, proactive gap analysis

description: Risk assessment documenting potential areas of non-compliance with DMA obligations, associated financial penalties, and mitigation measures to ensure ongoing compliance
auditor_questions: Show me your compliance risk assessment for DMA obligations
How do you identify and prioritise areas of potential non-compliance?
What mitigation measures are in place for the highest-risk areas?
How do you prepare for potential Commission investigations?

maturity_levels.basic: Basic awareness of penalty framework, key compliance risks identified
maturity_levels.intermediate: Structured risk register, mitigation plans, regular compliance reviews
maturity_levels.advanced: Proactive compliance management, automated risk monitoring, scenario planning for enforcement actions
